nodes.documentation:
Standard ERC20 token with Short Hand Attack and approve() race condition mitigation.
 * Based on code by FirstBlood:
https://github.com/Firstbloodio/token/blob/master/smart_contract/FirstBloodToken.sol
nodes.name: StandardToken

nodes.documentation:
* Fix for the ERC20 short address attack
   * http://vessenes.com/the-erc20-short-address-attack-explained/
nodes.name: onlyPayloadSize

nodes.documentation:
Atomic increment of approved spending
   * Works around https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729
nodes.name: addApproval

nodes.documentation:
Atomic decrement of approved spending.
   * Works around https://github.com/ethereum/EIPs/issues/20#issuecomment-263524729
nodes.name: subApproval
Ownable

nodes.documentation:
@dev The Ownable constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: @dev Throws if called by any account other than the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
@param newOwner The address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: Somebody has upgraded some of his tokens.
nodes.name: Upgrade
